stages.name: Verse 17
stages.arabic: مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ الَّذِي اسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًا فَلَمَّا أَضَاءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهُ ذَهَبَ اللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِي ظُلُمَاتٍ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ
stages.english: Their example is that of one who kindled a fire, but when it illuminated what was around him, Allah took away their light and left them in darkness [so] they could not see
stages.transliteration: Mathaluhum kamathallal ladhi istawqada naran falammaa adaa'at maa hawlahu thahabal laahu binoorihim wa tarakahum fee zulumaatil laa yubsiroon
stages.instruction: Understand the parable of the hypocrites' spiritual darkness

stages.name: Verse 18
stages.arabic: صُمٌّ بُكْمٌ عُمْيٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
stages.english: Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path]

stages.name: Verse 19
stages.arabic: أَوْ كَصَيِّبٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَاتٌ وَرَعْدٌ وَبَرْقٌ يَجْعَلُونَ أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِم مِّنَ الصَّوَاعِقِ حَذَرَ الْمَوْتِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ مُحِيطٌ بِالْكَافِرِينَ
stages.english: Or [it is] like a rainstorm from the sky within which is darkness, thunder and lightning. They put their fingers in their ears against the thunderclaps in dread of death. But Allah is encompassing of the disbelievers
stages.transliteration: Aw kasayyibim minas-samaaa'i feehi zulumaatunw wa ra'dunw wa barq; yaj'aloona asaabi'ahum feee aazaanihim minas sawaa'iqi hazaral mawt; wallaahu muheetum bil kaafireen
stages.instruction: Understand the parable of truth's impact on hypocrites

stages.name: Verse 20
stages.arabic: يَكَادُ الْبَرْقُ يَخْطَفُ أَبْصَارَهُمْ ۖ كُلَّمَا أَضَاءَ لَهُم مَّشَوْا فِيهِ وَإِذَا أَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ قَامُوا ۚ وَلَوْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمْعِهِمْ وَأَبْصَارِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
stages.english: The lightning almost snatches away their sight. Every time it lights [the way] for them, they walk therein; but when darkness comes over them, they stand [still]. And if Allah had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allah is over all things competent
stages.transliteration: Yakadul barqu yakhtafu absaarahum kullamaaa adaaa'a lahum mashaw feehi wa izaaa azlama 'alaihim qaamoo; wa law shaaa'al laahu lathahaba bisam'ihim wa absaarihim; innal laaha 'alaa kulli shai'in Qadeer
stages.instruction: Learn about the hesitation of hypocrites between guidance and misguidance

stages.name: Verse 21
stages.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اعْبُدُوا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ وَالَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
stages.english: O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous
stages.transliteration: Yaaa ayyuhan naasu'budoo Rabbakumul lazee khalaqakum wallazeena min qablikum la'allakum tattaqoon
stages.instruction: Universal call to worship the Creator

stages.name: Verse 22
stages.arabic: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ فِرَاشًا وَالسَّمَاءَ بِنَاءً وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجَ بِهِ مِنَ الثَّمَرَاتِ رِزْقًا لَّكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوا لِلَّهِ أَندَادًا وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
stages.english: [He] who made for you the earth a bed [spread out] and the sky a ceiling and sent down from the sky, rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allah equals while you know [that there is nothing similar to Him]
stages.transliteration: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda firaashanw wassamaaa'a binaaa'anw wa anzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an fa akhraja bihee minas samaraati rizqal lakum falaa taj'aloo lillaahi andaadanw wa antum ta'lamoon
stages.instruction: Reflect on Allah's signs in creation

stages.name: Verse 23
stages.arabic: وَإِن كُنتُمْ فِي رَيْبٍ مِّمَّا نَزَّلْنَا عَلَىٰ عَبْدِنَا فَأْتُوا بِسُورَةٍ مِّن مِّثْلِهِ وَادْعُوا شُهَدَاءَكُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
stages.english: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down upon Our Servant [Muhammad], then produce a surah the like thereof and call upon your witnesses other than Allah, if you should be truthful
stages.transliteration: Wa in kuntum fee raibim mimmaa nazzalnaa 'alaa 'abdinaa faatoo bi Sooratim mim mislihee wad'oo shuhadaaa 'akum min doonil laahi in kuntum saadiqeen
stages.instruction: Challenge to those who doubt the Quran

stages.name: Verse 24
stages.arabic: فَإِن لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوا وَلَن تَفْعَلُوا فَاتَّقُوا النَّارَ الَّتِي وَقُودُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجَارَةُ ۖ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْكَافِرِينَ
stages.english: But if you do not - and you will never be able to - then fear the Fire, whose fuel is men and stones, prepared for the disbelievers
stages.transliteration: Fa il lam taf'aloo wa lan taf'aloo fattaqun Naaral latee waqooduhan naasu walhijaarah; u'iddat lilkaafireen
stages.instruction: Warning about the consequences of disbelief

stages.name: Verse 25
stages.arabic: وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوا مِنْهَا مِن ثَمَرَةٍ رِّزْقًا ۙ قَالُوا هَٰذَا الَّذِي رُزِقْنَا مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَأُتُوا بِهِ مُتَشَابِهًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا أَزْوَاجٌ مُّطَهَّرَةٌ ۖ وَهُمْ فِيهَا خَالِدُونَ
stages.english: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with a provision of fruit therefrom, they will say, 'This is what we were provided with before.' And it is given to them in likeness. And they will have therein purified spouses, and they will abide therein eternally
stages.transliteration: Wa bashshiril lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati anna lahum Jannaatin tajree min tahtihal anhaar; kullamaa ruziqoo minhaa min samaratir rizqan qaaloo haazal lazee ruziqnaa min qablu wa utoo bihee mutashaabihaa wa lahum feehaaa azwaajum mutahharatunw wa hum feehaa khaalidoon
stages.instruction: Learn about the rewards of the believers
